paragraphs.text:
def sendEvent(event: String, message: String): Unit = {
  // See https://alvinalexander.com/scala/scala-rest-client-apache-httpclient-restful-clients
  val IFTTT_TOKEN = sys.env("IFTTT_TOKEN")

  import org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpPost
  import org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient

  val url = s"https://maker.ifttt.com/trigger/$event/with/key/$IFTTT_TOKEN"
  println(s"Sending message to $url")
  
  val post = new HttpPost(url)
  
  val client = new DefaultHttpClient
  val response = client.execute(post)
  response.getAllHeaders.foreach(arg => println(arg))
  
  val entity = response.getEntity()
  var content = ""
  if (entity != null) {
    val inputStream = entity.getContent()
    content = scala.io.Source.fromInputStream(inputStream).getLines.mkString
    inputStream.close
  }
  
  println("Received: " + content)
  
  client.getConnectionManager().shutdown()
  
}
